pages.text:
Festival Management Group, Inc. is a Delray Beach Florida based full-service Event Management and Production Company. Our team of international award-winning professionals has specialized in producing events from concept to production to completion for the past 26 years.
We’ve currently produce four internationally award winning signature events in South Florida, where events have created a destination for brands and talent from around the US and attracting visitors from all around the country.
Capabilities include
Site Design
Budgets
Technical Services
Permits
Exhibitor Contracts
Logistics
Exhibitor Services
Sponsorship and Sponsor VIP services
Advertising
Staff and Volunteer Coordination
Site Management
Lighting, Audio, Visual, Staging and Entertainment
Your Event Managers
Nancy Stewart-Franczak
is directly responsible for ensuring your events success. Nancy will work directly with your assigned staff and team throughout the entire process, to design, coordinate and plan your event with our specialized team of suppliers and provide on-site management and support on the days of your event.
Nancy has completed the training and joined the ranks of 420 Certified Festival & Event Executives worldwide.
Bern Ryan
is directly responsible for supplier contract negotiations, setup and production management that includes the following components: operations, staffing, security, parking, beverages, food concessions, city services, and permitting.
Jennifer Costello
is support for event production management, set-up and sponsor & exhibitor fulfillment. She is also directly responsible for backstage and volunteer management.
John Franczak
is manager of sponsorship sales and assists with sponsor relations and assigned to key sponsors as a Sponsor Liaison to assist sponsors with load-in, setup and miscellaneous assistance needed during the events.
Maria Cordero
is manager of Exhibitors for events produced and directly responsible for online management and tracking of exhibitor contracts and payments, exhibitor selection, placement and logistics. She is also the onsite manager during events including load-in and tear-down.
For a full profile of FMG and what we can do for your event, read our
white paper
on our full capabilities.

140 NE 1st Street
Delray Beach, FL 33444
